item.title: Kubernetes Logs
item.description: Kubernetes Logging Traditionally, applications on servers generate logs that are often routed to /var/log.

item.title: Logging with EFK
item.description: This lab takes you through the basics of deploying a logging solution for observing your applications on Kubernetes.
